SLEEP STUDY SERIOUS GAME

Currently I'm doing a game project for the Children's Hospital of Pennsylvania. I am working in a team of 5 to develop a game for children with Down syndrome intended to help their understanding of what a sleep study entails for a better informed assent. My team has visited the CHOP hospital to talk to researchers and some children with Down Syndrome to get information on how to make this game as accessible as possible. We learned what design and script would be the most clear to the kids. We also talked to their parents to learn what sort of things would motivate and excite their children. I have included our design doc here.

); }
